Summary: 3-4 Pulsating Stationary and Moving Lights Back in Area. West of Grove City, OH
divs: Sighting DetailsThe same glowing and pulsating and flashing orbs of light are again in the sky tonight. They are West of Grove City. There is a plane flying around them, appears to be observing them. RIGHT NOW
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Grove City
There were no other sightings in Grove City on or around May 29th 2012
